test_cases.stdin:
ADD BOOK "Dune" "Frank Herbert"
ADD MEMBER "Bob" 101
CHECKOUT 101 "Dune"
CHECKOUT 101 "Dune"
RETURN "Dune"
EXIT
test_cases.expected_output:
Book "Dune" added.
Member "Bob" registered.
Checkout successful.
Error: Book not available.
Return successful.

test_cases.stdin:
ADD BOOK "1984" "George Orwell"
ADD MEMBER "Alice" 200
CHECKOUT 999 "1984"
CHECKOUT 200 "Unknown"
EXIT
test_cases.expected_output:
Book "1984" added.
Member "Alice" registered.
Error: Member not found.
Error: Book not found.

test_cases.stdin:
RETURN "NonExistent"
ADD BOOK "Brave New World" "Aldous Huxley"
RETURN "Brave New World"
EXIT
test_cases.expected_output:
Error: Book not in records or was not checked out.
Book "Brave New World" added.
Error: Book not in records or was not checked out.

EXIT

Error: Book not available.
